Custom Brochures Features

Standard Features:

  • Full-color, double-sided printing
  • Multiple folding options (Bi-Fold, Tri-Fold, Z-Fold)
  • Premium 100lb gloss book paper stock
  • High-resolution 300 DPI printing
  • Fast turnaround time (3-5 business days)
  • Free proof before printing

Premium Add-ons:

  • Heavy cardstock (10pt, 12pt, 14pt)
  • Premium coatings (UV, Aqueous, Soft Touch)
  • Custom die-cutting and shapes
  • Spot UV and foil stamping
  • Perforation and scoring
  • Rush printing (24-48 hours)

Why Choose Our Custom Brochures?

Professional Design

Expert design services available to create stunning, on-brand brochures that capture attention.

Quality Printing

State-of-the-art printing technology ensures vibrant colors and crisp text every time.

Fast Delivery

Quick turnaround times with reliable shipping options to meet your deadlines.

Frequently Asked Questions

Our most popular sizes are:

  • 8.5" x 11" (Letter size)
  • 8.5" x 14" (Legal size)
  • 11" x 17" (Tabloid size)

Common folds include Bi-Fold (2 panels), Tri-Fold (3 panels), and Z-Fold (6 panels). We also offer custom folding options for unique designs.

We recommend:

  • Standard: 100lb gloss book - Perfect for most marketing materials
  • Premium: 10pt cardstock - Great for luxury products and services
  • Durable: 12pt cardstock with UV coating - Ideal for long-lasting materials

Our team can help you select the best option based on your needs and budget.

Standard turnaround time is 3-5 business days. We also offer:

  • Rush printing (24-48 hours)
  • Same-day proofing
  • Express shipping options

Contact us for specific timing based on your order quantity and requirements.

Technical Specifications

Standard Specifications:

  • Paper Stock: 100lb Gloss Book
  • Printing: Full-color CMYK
  • Resolution: 300 DPI

File Requirements:

  • Format: PDF, AI, PSD, high-res JPG
  • Color Mode: CMYK
  • Bleed: 0.125" on all sides

Templates

Download our ready-to-use templates to ensure your design meets our specifications:

  • 8.5" x 11" Bi-Fold Brochure Template
  • 8.5" x 11" Tri-Fold Brochure Template
  • 11" x 17" Z-Fold Brochure Template
